parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Specifies the entity which will activate the selected trigger.<br>
*If '''[]''' is given, the trigger is decoupled from the assigned vehicle (example 2).
*If the activation source is '''"VEHICLE"''', '''"GROUP"''', '''"LEADER"''' or '''"MEMBER"''', it is changed to '''"NONE"'''. 
*If '''[vehicle]''' is given, the trigger is coupled to the vehicle or its group. 
*When the source is '''"GROUP"''', '''"LEADER"''' or '''"MEMBER"''', it is coupled to the group, otherwise it is coupled to the vehicle and the source is changed to '''"VEHICLE"'''.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> triggerName '''triggerAttachVehicle''' objects

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> triggerName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> objects: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>trigger '''triggerAttachVehicle''' [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[player]]<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>];</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>trigger '''triggerAttachVehicle''' <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[]</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[attachObject]], [[attachTo]], [[attachedObjects]], [[attachedTo]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[lightAttachObject]], [[attachedObject]], [[triggerAttachedVehicle]], [[triggerAttachObject]], [[triggerInterval]], [[setTriggerInterval]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
